code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     // null is invalid     from("seda:a").throttle(null).to("mock:result"). }

@Test public void testInvalid() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             // null is invalid             from("seda:a").throttle(null).to("mock:result").         }     }).     try {         context.start().         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (FailedToCreateRouteException e) {         IllegalArgumentException cause = assertIsInstanceOf(IllegalArgumentException.class, e.getCause()).         assertTrue(cause.getMessage().startsWith("MaxRequestsPerPeriod expression must be provided")).     }     context.stop(). }
